**Tender Announcement**
================================

### Title

Provision of Translation, Source Text Editing, and Comparative Editing Services

### Reference Number

PW-22-01016216

### Tender Description

Employment and Social Development Canada is seeking to establish a Standing Offer for the provision of Translation, Source Text Editing, and Comparative Editing services. The work involves editing and translation of administrative and/or legal documents. The successful offeror will use their own resources and equipment to perform the work at their designated site.

### Bid Details

*   **Duration**: The initial Standing Offer period will be 2 years with an option to renew for up to 2 years.
*   **Maximum Number of Bidders**: Up to 6 successful offerors will be issued a Standing Offer.
*   **Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements**: This bid excludes deliveries to locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador that are subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements.

### Security Requirements

The requirement includes security requirements. Refer to Part 6 – Security and Part 7 – Standing Offer and Resulting Contract Clauses for additional information.

### Funding and Trade Agreements

*   **Trade Agreements**: The bid is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
*   **Indigenous and Northern Communities**: This bid does not apply to deliveries within Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs) areas.

### Submission Requirements

*   **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   **Attachment**: The bid package is available at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/e72a2k/meks67rso-100018542.pdf.
*   **Additional Information**: Contact Lafontaine, Pascale at nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
